title: Context
description: Buyer signals that help the business tailor responses for relevance and localization: product availability, pricing, currency, tax, shipping, payment methods, and eligibility (e.g., student or affiliation discounts). Context can be disclosed progressivelyâ€”coarse signals early in the journey, finer resolution as the session progresses to improve relevance and accuracy. Higher-resolution data provided elsewhere (shipping address, billing address) supersedes provided context. Platforms SHOULD provide and progressively enhance context throughout the buyer journey to optimize relevance and localization.

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., 'US', 'CA'). Informs product availability, pricing, and currency. Detected from request if omitted.

region.description: State, province, emirate, or district (e.g., 'CA', 'ON', 'Dubai'). Format varies by country.

postal_code.description: Postal or ZIP code for regional refinement. Not applicable in all countries.
